title: The Satiric eye
creator_credit: Learning Corporation of America, Hungarofilm and DEFA Studio
brief_description: Presents several animated pieces which satirize man in society. Illustrative sequences include a corpse which laughs at everyone’s grief; red tape which cannot be cut at the dedication of a bridge; and a lion that eats his tamer during a performance at a circus.
